iti101:2.1_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
iti101:2.3_0: Paṁsukūlaṁ, bhikkhave, cīvarānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
iti101:2.4_0: Piṇḍiyālopo, bhikkhave, bhojanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
iti101:2.5_0: Rukkhamūlaṁ, bhikkhave, senāsanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
iti101:2.6_0: Pūtimuttaṁ, bhikkhave, bhesajjānaṁ appañca sulabhañca tañca anavajjaṁ.
iti101:2.7_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
iti101:2.8_2: bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭho hoti sulabhena ca anavajjena ca,
iti101:5.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
